creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: dark scene with silhouette of man seated in an armchair at a table, bent over his work, with a panel in front of his head, diffusing light from a large hanging lamp in ULQ
title: The Engraver
